mapper.select: select t1.id as id,t1.sightId as sightId,t1.*,t2.* from t_sightinfo as t1 join t_sightupdateinfo as t2 on t1.sightId=t2.sightId where t1.id=#{id}
select t1.id as id,t1.sightId as sightId,t1.*,t2.* from t_sightinfo as t1 join t_sightupdateinfo as t2 on t1.sightId=t2.sightId where t1.sightId=#{sightId}
SELECT sightName,star,city,saleCount FROM t_sightinfo as t1 INNER JOIN t_sightmonthlysalecount as t2 on t1.sightId=t2.sightId where t1.province=#{province} ORDER BY saleCount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT t1.sightName as sightName,t1.star as star,t2.saleCount as value FROM t_sightinfo as t1 INNER JOIN t_sightmonthlysalecount as t2 on t1.sightId=t2.sightId where province=#{province}
SELECT sightName,point as value FROM t_sightinfo where province=#{province}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t1.sightId) as value FROM t_sightinfo as t1 INNER JOIN t_sightupdateinfo as t2 ON t1.sightId=t2.sightId WHERE province=#{province} and qunarPrice BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT star,count(DISTINCT sightId) as value from t_sightinfo where t_sightinfo.province=#{province} group by star

SELECT city,COUNT(CASE WHEN star is NULL THEN '1' END ) as other, COUNT(CASE WHEN star='3A' THEN '1' END ) as 3A, COUNT(CASE WHEN star='4A' THEN '1' END ) as 4A, COUNT(CASE WHEN star='5A' THEN '1' END ) as 5A FROM t_sightinfo where province=#{province} GROUP BY city ORDER BY COUNT(sightId) DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT SUM(saleCount) as value FROM t_sightmonthlysalecount where t_sightmonthlysalecount.sightId in (select sightId from t_sightinfo where t_sightinfo.province=#{province})
SELECT star,SUM(saleCount) as value FROM t_sightinfo INNER JOIN t_sightmonthlysalecount on t_sightinfo.sightId=t_sightmonthlysalecount.sightId and t_sightinfo.province=#{province} GROUP BY star
